systemPrompt: You are a helpful AI assistant

customPrompts.name: Summarize
customPrompts.template:
Please provide a comprehensive summary of the following content. Include the main points, key takeaways, and important details:

{cursor}

customPrompts.name: Rewrite
customPrompts.template:
Please rewrite the following text to improve clarity, readability, and flow while maintaining the original meaning and tone:

{cursor}

customPrompts.name: Explain like I'm 5
customPrompts.template: Please explain {cursor} in simple terms that a 5-year-old could understand. Use everyday examples and avoid complex terminology.
